title: Chest pain (low risk)

fields.name: risk_factor_followup
fields.label: Risk factor follow-up
fields.helpText: Optional: smoking cessation, lipid checks, etc.

body:
You were assessed today for chest pain. Your tests did not show evidence of a heart attack at this time.

Investigations performed:
{{investigations}}

{{#if risk_factor_followup}}Risk factor follow-up:
{{risk_factor_followup}}

{{/if}}Return to ED urgently if you develop:
- Chest pain that is severe, worsening, or lasts more than 10 minutes
- Shortness of breath, sweating, fainting, or palpitations
- New pain radiating to jaw, back, or left arm

Follow-up: {{followup_timeframe}}.
disclaimer: Chest pain can change. Seek urgent care if symptoms worsen.
